EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK_O_08 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade EXTERNAL.2018BK_O_08 MST 67A Transponder
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | March 16, 2018
BendixKing would like to present to you the following 2018 Sales Bulletin. The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins are available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log-in to view these bulletins.
Operator Sales Bulletin:
2018BK_O_08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK_O_08 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade Global ADS-B Out Compliance with MST 70B.pdf]]> MST 67A Transponder Upgrade Global ADS-B Out Compliance with MST 70B. BendixKing is pleased to offer a price discount for the MST 70B ADS-B Out upgrade for business jets equipped with the MST 67A transponder.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team <[[http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
